critical_requirements.jd_proof_text: Demonstrated ability to translate customer needs into requirements, user stories, business rules and acceptance criteria.
critical_requirements.cv_evidence: Experience analyzing customer support data and generating actionable insights for business decisions

critical_requirements.jd_proof_text: Proven track record managing the delivery of a piece of work to agreed scope, schedule and quality.
critical_requirements.cv_evidence: Successfully delivered multiple data analysis projects meeting strict deadlines for strategic decision-making

critical_requirements.jd_proof_text: Strong analytical and lateral thinking skills that drive you to find the best solution, while being cognisant of constraints.
critical_requirements.cv_evidence: PhD in Physics and Master's in Data Science with extensive experience in data analysis and problem-solving

critical_requirements.jd_proof_text: Strong communication skills (including listening, written and verbal) to ensure that you're able to elicit the requirements and convey them to others in an efficient and effective manner.
critical_requirements.cv_evidence: Experience as Lecturer presenting research findings at international conferences and mentoring students

critical_requirements.jd_proof_text: Experience working in an agile environment (scrum).
critical_requirements.cv_evidence: No specific agile or scrum experience mentioned

critical_requirements.jd_proof_text: Experience in web-based application/s and web form projects, including mobile friendly applications.
critical_requirements.cv_evidence: No web application development experience mentioned

critical_requirements.jd_proof_text: Interest in and ability to use web-based technologies including Java and CSS
Interest in and ability to use web-based technologies including Java and CSS
